item.title: Custom Template
item.description: Example https://github.com/buttahtoast/helmize/tree/main/examples/example-customization You can implement your own render template. The render template constructs the output YAML when templating the entire structure. Configuration General configuration for a Render Template. Template Hereâ€™s a minimalstic Renderer Template to get started. {{- define "render.template" -}} {{- range $wagon := $.train.wagons -}} {{/* Render Logic */}} {{/* Include Default Wagon Render Template (If you still want to use our template) */}} {{- include "helmize.
